verses.verse: Now these are the generations <WH8435> of Esau <WH6215> (the same is Edom <WH123>).

Esau <WH6215> took <WH3947> his wives <WH802> of the daughters <WH1323> of Canaan <WH3667>: Adah <WH5711> the daughter <WH1323> of Elon <WH356> the Hittite <WH2850>, and Oholibamah <WH173> the daughter <WH1323> of Anah <WH6034>, the daughter <WH1323> of Zibeon <WH6649> the Hivite <WH2340>,
and Basemath <WH1315> Ishmael <WH3458>'s daughter <WH1323>, sister <WH269> of Nebaioth <WH5032>.
And Adah <WH5711> bare <WH3205> to Esau <WH6215> Eliphaz <WH464>; and Basemath <WH1315> bare <WH3205> Reuel <WH7467>;

and Oholibamah <WH173> bare <WH3205> Jeush <WH3274>, and Jalam <WH3281>, and Korah <WH7141>: these are the sons <WH1121> of Esau <WH6215>, that were born <WH3205> unto him in the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>.

And Esau <WH6215> took <WH3947> his wives <WH802>, and his sons <WH1121>, and his daughters <WH1323>, and all the souls <WH5315> of his house <WH1004>, and his cattle <WH4735>, and all his beasts <WH929>, and all his possessions <WH7075>, which he had gathered <WH7408> in the land <WH776> of Canaan <WH3667>; and went <WH3212> into a land <WH776> away <WH6440> from his brother <WH251> Jacob <WH3290>.

For their substance <WH7399> was too <WH7227> great for them to dwell <WH3427> together <WH3162>; and the land <WH776> of their sojournings <WH4033> could <WH3201> not bear <WH5375> them because <WH6440> of their cattle <WH4735>.
And Esau <WH6215> dwelt <WH3427> in mount <WH2022> Seir <WH8165>: Esau <WH6215> is Edom <WH123>.
And these are the generations <WH8435> of Esau <WH6215> the father <WH1> of the Edomites <WH123> in mount <WH2022> Seir <WH8165>:

these are the names <WH8034> of Esau <WH6215>'s sons <WH1121>: Eliphaz <WH464> the son <WH1121> of Adah <WH5711> the wife <WH802> of Esau <WH6215>, Reuel <WH7467> the son <WH1121> of Basemath <WH1315> the wife <WH802> of Esau <WH6215>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Eliphaz <WH464> were Teman <WH8487>, Omar <WH201>, Zepho <WH6825>, and Gatam <WH1609>, and Kenaz <WH7073>.

And Timna <WH8555> was concubine <WH6370> to Eliphaz <WH464> Esau <WH6215>'s son <WH1121>; and she bare <WH3205> to Eliphaz <WH464> Amalek <WH6002>: these are the sons <WH1121> of Adah <WH5711>, Esau <WH6215>'s wife <WH802>.

And these are the sons <WH1121> of Reuel <WH7467>: Nahath <WH5184>, and Zerah <WH2226>, Shammah <WH8048>, and Mizzah <WH4199>: these were the sons <WH1121> of Basemath <WH1315>, Esau <WH6215>'s wife <WH802>.

And these were the sons <WH1121> of Oholibamah <WH173> the daughter <WH1323> of Anah <WH6034>, the daughter <WH1323> of Zibeon <WH6649>, Esau <WH6215>'s wife <WH802>: and she bare <WH3205> to Esau <WH6215> Jeush <WH3274>, and Jalam <WH3281>, and Korah <WH7141>.

These are the chiefs <WH441> of the sons <WH1121> of Esau <WH6215>: the sons <WH1121> of Eliphaz <WH464> the first-born <WH1060> of Esau <WH6215>: chief <WH441> Teman <WH8487>, chief <WH441> Omar <WH201>, chief <WH441> Zepho <WH6825>, chief <WH441> Kenaz <WH7073>,

chief <WH441> Korah <WH7141>, chief <WH441> Gatam <WH1609>, chief <WH441> Amalek <WH6002>: these are the chiefs <WH441> that came of Eliphaz <WH464> in the land <WH776> of Edom <WH123>; these are the sons <WH1121> of Adah <WH5711>.

And these are the sons <WH1121> of Reuel <WH7467>, Esau <WH6215>'s son <WH1121>: chief <WH441> Nahath <WH5184>, chief <WH441> Zerah <WH2226>, chief <WH441> Shammah <WH8048>, chief <WH441> Mizzah <WH4199>: these are the chiefs <WH441> that came of Reuel <WH7467> in the land <WH776> of Edom <WH123>; these are the sons <WH1121> of Basemath <WH1315>, Esau <WH6215>'s wife <WH802>.

And these are the sons <WH1121> of Oholibamah <WH173>, Esau <WH6215>'s wife <WH802>: chief <WH441> Jeush <WH3266>, chief <WH441> Jalam <WH3281>, chief <WH441> Korah <WH7141>: these are the chiefs <WH441> that came of Oholibamah <WH173> the daughter <WH1323> of Anah <WH6034>, Esau <WH6215>'s wife <WH802>.
These are the sons <WH1121> of Esau <WH6215>, and these are their chiefs <WH441>: the same is Edom <WH123>.
These are the sons <WH1121> of Seir <WH8165> the Horite <WH2752>, the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776>: Lotan <WH3877> and Shobal <WH7732> and Zibeon <WH6649> and Anah <WH6034>,
and Dishon <WH1787> and Ezer <WH687> and Dishan <WH1789>: these are the chiefs <WH441> that came of the Horites <WH2752>, the children <WH1121> of Seir <WH8165> in the land <WH776> of Edom <WH123>.
And the children <WH1121> of Lotan <WH3877> were Hori <WH2753> and Heman <WH1967>; and Lotan <WH3877>'s sister <WH269> was Timna <WH8555>.
And these are the children <WH1121> of Shobal <WH7732>: Alvan <WH5935> and Manahath <WH4506> and Ebal <WH5858>, Shepho <WH8195> and Onam <WH208>.

And these are the children <WH1121> of Zibeon <WH6649>: Aiah <WH345> and Anah <WH6034>; this is Anah <WH6034> who found <WH4672> the hot springs <WH3222> in the wilderness <WH4057>, as he fed <WH7462> the asses <WH2543> of Zibeon <WH6649> his father <WH1>.
And these are the children <WH1121> of Anah <WH6034>: Dishon <WH1787> and Oholibamah <WH173> the daughter <WH1323> of Anah <WH6034>.
And these are the children <WH1121> of Dishon <WH1787>: Hemdan <WH2533> and Eshban <WH790> and Ithran <WH3506> and Cheran <WH3763>.
These are the children <WH1121> of Ezer <WH687>: Bilhan <WH1092> and Zaavan <WH2190> and Akan <WH6130>.
These are the children <WH1121> of Dishan <WH1789>: Uz <WH5780> and Aran <WH765>.
These are the chiefs <WH441> that came of the Horites <WH2752>: chief <WH441> Lotan <WH3877>, chief <WH441> Shobal <WH7732>, chief <WH441> Zibeon <WH6649>, chief <WH441> Anah <WH6034>,

chief <WH441> Dishon <WH1787>, chief <WH441> Ezer <WH687>, chief <WH441> Dishan <WH1789>: these are the chiefs <WH441> that came of the Horites <WH2753>, according to their chiefs <WH441> in the land <WH776> of Seir <WH8165>.
And these are the kings <WH4428> that reigned <WH4427> in the land <WH776> of Edom <WH123>, before <WH6440> there reigned <WH4427> any king <WH4428> over the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>.
And Bela <WH1106> the son <WH1121> of Beor <WH1160> reigned <WH4427> in Edom <WH123>; and the name <WH8034> of his city <WH5892> was Dinhabah <WH1838>.
And Bela <WH1106> died <WH4191>, and Jobab <WH3103> the son <WH1121> of Zerah <WH2226> of Bozrah <WH1224> reigned in his stead <WH4427>.
And Jobab <WH3103> died <WH4191>, and Husham <WH2367> of the land <WH776> of the Temanites <WH8489> reigned in his stead <WH4427>.

And Husham <WH2367> died <WH4191>, and Hadad <WH1908> the son <WH1121> of Bedad <WH911>, who smote <WH5221> Midian <WH4080> in the field <WH7704> of Moab <WH4124>, reigned <WH4427> in his stead <WH8034>: and the name of his city <WH5892> was Avith <WH5762>.
And Hadad <WH1908> died <WH4191>, and Samlah <WH8072> of Masrekah <WH4957> reigned in his stead <WH4427>.
And Samlah <WH8072> died <WH4191>, and Shaul <WH7586> of Rehoboth <WH7344> by the River <WH5104> reigned in his stead <WH4427>.
And Shaul <WH7586> died <WH4191>, and Baal-hanan <WH1177> the son <WH1121> of Achbor <WH5907> reigned in his stead <WH4427>.

And Baal-hanan <WH1177> the son <WH1121> of Achbor <WH5907> died <WH4191>, and Hadar <WH1924> reigned <WH4427> in his stead <WH8034>: and the name of his city <WH5892> was Pau <WH6464>; and his wife <WH802>'s name <WH8034> was Mehetabel <WH4105>, the daughter <WH1323> of Matred <WH4308>, the daughter <WH1323> of Me-zahab <WH4314>.

And these are the names <WH8034> of the chiefs <WH441> that came of Esau <WH6215>, according to their families <WH4940>, after their places <WH4725>, by their names <WH8034>: chief <WH441> Timna <WH8555>, chief <WH441> Alvah <WH5933>, chief <WH441> Jetheth <WH3509>,
chief <WH441> Oholibamah <WH173>, chief <WH441> Elah <WH425>, chief <WH441> Pinon <WH6373>,
chief <WH441> Kenaz <WH7073>, chief <WH441> Teman <WH8487>, chief <WH441> Mibzar <WH4014>,

chief <WH441> Magdiel <WH4025>, chief <WH441> Iram <WH5902>: these are the chiefs <WH441> of Edom <WH123>, according to their habitations <WH4186> in the land <WH776> of their possession <WH272>. This is Esau <WH6215>, the father <WH1> of the Edomites <WH123>.
